name: Icarus - The journey to the sun.
name_original: Icarus - The journey to the sun.
description:
Icarus is on a journey to the sun because his Facebook friends said it wasnt real. Fail to be a functioning member of society as you fly into the sun. Oh yeah, look out for Easter eggs!

Press 'R' to reset to the last checkpoint or 'T' to do a full reset of the game.

Move using the arrows or use A, S and SPACE
